title: Implement upstream sync: create/update Jira/Linear issues from Issue_Tracker issue object

sections.text: Add first-class upstream sync so an Issue_Tracker issue/theme can create a Jira/Linear issue and subsequently push updates (title, description, priority, labels, customer impact summary, and backlinks). Store and display the external issue key/URL plus a stable mapping to the Issue_Tracker issue object. Ensure updates are idempotent and handle missing permissions/invalid projects gracefully with clear error messaging.
